meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 2271.1 (the rightmost black digit, representing tenths, is clearly a '1' despite some blur). The red needle on the circular dial is precisely halfway between the 0.03 and 0.04 marks. Following the rule to 'interpolate to one decimal tick (0.01 resolution)' and 'choose the closest value', 0.035 is rounded up to 0.04. The actual physical angle of the needle, corresponding to 0.035, is 126 degrees from the 0 position (top).
